languages.text: "Нет, Ваша Светлость". {n}Вайс мрачно качает головой.{/n} "Ритуалу оказалось не под силу добыть ничего ценного. Это зло само решило обнаружить себя и напасть. Наш враг самоуверен и дерзок, а потому не стал прятаться, ударил первым. Подозрительная наглость с его стороны..."

"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Ваша Светлость". {n}Вайс мрачно качает головой.{/n} "Ритуалу оказалось не под силу добыть ничего ценного. Это зло само решило обнаружить себя и напасть. Наш враг самоуверен и дерзок, а потому не стал прятаться, ударил первым. Подозрительная наглость с его стороны..."

traits.locale_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

"No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

languages.text: «No, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Weisz niega con la cabeza con semblante serio.{/n} «El ritual no ha sacado nada en claro. El mal ha elegido mostrarse y atacar. Nuestro enemigo está confiado y es valiente: optó por no esconderse y atacar primero. Un atrevimiento sospechoso, si me pregunta...».
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

traits.locale_text: «No, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Weisz niega con la cabeza con semblante serio.{/n} «El ritual no ha sacado nada en claro. El mal ha elegido mostrarse y atacar. Nuestro enemigo está confiado y es valiente: optó por no esconderse y atacar primero. Un atrevimiento sospechoso, si me pregunta...».

languages.text: 「いいえ、陛下」{n}ワイズは険しい表情で首を振る。{/n}「儀式では有用な情報を引き出せないことが分かりました。あの悪魔は正体を現して攻撃することを選んだのです。敵は自信満々で命知らず。隠れもせずにあちらから攻撃を仕掛けてきました。不審なほど度胸がある…」
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、陛下」{n}ワイズは険しい表情で首を振る。{/n}「儀式では有用な情報を引き出せないことが分かりました。あの悪魔は正体を現して攻撃することを選んだのです。敵は自信満々で命知らず。隠れもせずにあちらから攻撃を仕掛けてきました。不審なほど度胸がある…」

languages.text: “没有，大人。”{n}威茨严峻地摇了摇头。{/n}“这场仪式没能找到任何有价值的东西。那个邪恶之物在我们面前现身，向我们发起了攻击。我们的敌人胆大妄为、信心十足，他并没有躲躲藏藏，而是选择先下手为强，这实在是太无所顾忌了，让人觉得有些古怪……”
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

traits.locale_text: “没有，大人。”{n}威茨严峻地摇了摇头。{/n}“这场仪式没能找到任何有价值的东西。那个邪恶之物在我们面前现身，向我们发起了攻击。我们的敌人胆大妄为、信心十足，他并没有躲躲藏藏，而是选择先下手为强，这实在是太无所顾忌了，让人觉得有些古怪……”

languages.text: "Nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Weisz schüttelt grimmig den Kopf.{/n} "Das Ritual hat nichts von Wert offenbart. Das Böse hat beschlossen, sich zu offenbaren und anzugreifen. Unser Feind ist selbstbewusst und mutig, also hat er sich nicht versteckt ... sondern zuerst zugeschlagen. Verdächtig dreist ..."
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Weisz schüttelt grimmig den Kopf.{/n} "Das Ritual hat nichts von Wert offenbart. Das Böse hat beschlossen, sich zu offenbaren und anzugreifen. Unser Feind ist selbstbewusst und mutig, also hat er sich nicht versteckt ... sondern zuerst zugeschlagen. Verdächtig dreist ..."

languages.text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. {n}Weisz secoue la tête d'un air sombre.{/n} Le rituel s'est avéré incapable de porter ses fruits. Ce mal impie a spontanément tombé le masque pour nous attaquer. Notre ennemi est audacieux et sûr de lui, aussi a-t-il choisi de frapper le premier au lieu de se cacher. Il fait preuve d'une hardiesse surprenante... »
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. {n}Weisz secoue la tête d'un air sombre.{/n} Le rituel s'est avéré incapable de porter ses fruits. Ce mal impie a spontanément tombé le masque pour nous attaquer. Notre ennemi est audacieux et sûr de lui, aussi a-t-il choisi de frapper le premier au lieu de se cacher. Il fait preuve d'une hardiesse surprenante... »

languages.text: "Hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Weisz, kasvetle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ayinin bilmeye değer hiçbir şeyi açığa çıkaramadığını gördük. Bu musibet, kendini göstererek saldırmayı seçti. Düşmanımız kendinden emin ve cesur. Bundandır ki saklanmak yerine ilk saldıran olmak istedi. Şaşırtıcı derecede küstah..."
languages.original_text: "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Weisz shakes his head grimly.{/n} "The ritual proved incapable of extracting anything of value. This evil chose to reveal itself and attack. Our enemy is confident and bold, and so it did not hide — it struck first. Suspiciously brazen..."
